subject: Introducing, not very good at this copy paste thing,

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

Greetings Seraph Members,
 
I know it's been a really long time for a post  to come through, but I have 
some exciting news for everyone here, I came across  three very interesting 
research groups on yahoo, below, they are have been  crossing the boarders 
of spiritual research not only in EVP, but are all on  their way into Real 
time talk with spirit world, you all got to join these three  lists, and get 
into the files they have posted.  They are great!  And  have been having 
conversations with loved ones, via the use of radios, box's,  etc...check on 
it, so wonderful!  Join these lists below for information on  how to get one 
of these radio's for yourself, talk with your loved again, it's  real, they 
have been making great progress.  God Bless you  all,
sf
 
_EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) 
 
_Seraph@yahoogroups.com_ (mailto:Seraph@yahoogroups.com) 
 
_inside_the_box_rtsc_radio@yahoogroups.com_
